definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.chinese: 我確證了這件事是真的。

sentences.english: The officer will confirm that you still meet the requirements for admission to Canada.
sentences.chinese: 工作人員會確證你是否仍然符合移民加拿大的要求。

sentences.english: Tell him a bench has wet paint on it and he'llhave to touch to be sure.
sentences.chinese: 告訴他椅子剛漆過他非用手摸一下以確證。
檢查則提供確證的資料。

sentences.english: It is well established that the cardial contraction is initiated when an action potential depolarizes the sarcolemma.
sentences.chinese: 已經確證，心肌收縮始於動作電位使肌膜去極化。

sentences.english: That is the most direct and reliable way to establish its factualness.
sentences.chinese: 這是確證白宮真實性的最直接和最可靠的方法。

sentences.english: This has been confirmed in scientific management.
sentences.chinese: 這一論斷在科學管理中得到了確證。

sentences.english: He says their finding is inconclusive and calls for more research.
sentences.chinese: 他說他們的發現是未確證的，並呼籲進行進一步研究。

sentences.english: The transition state structures were further confirmed by calculating the analytical force constant matrix.
sentences.chinese: 對過渡態結構都用分析力常數矩陣計算進行了確證。

sentences.english: It is well established that the cardiac contraction is initiated when an action potential depolarizes the sarcolemma.
sentences.chinese: 已經確證，心肌收縮始於動作電位使肌膜去極化。

sentences.english: Canvassing Board reconvenes to certify final election results.
sentences.chinese: 選舉審覈委員會再聚會確證最後舉舉結果。

sentences.english: The Guardian report could not be independently verified.
sentences.chinese: 衛報的報道未能得到單方面確證。

sentences.english: The product was characterized by melt point and IR spectra analysis.
sentences.chinese: 經熔點測定和紅外光譜分析，確證產品是苯酚。

sentences.english: Without corroboration from forensic tests it will be difficult to prove that the suspect is guilty.
sentences.chinese: 沒有法醫化驗的確證就很難證明嫌疑犯有罪。

sentences.english: For confirming the presence of Coliform bacteria by the multiple-tube fermentation technique.
sentences.chinese: 用途用於多管發酵法測定大腸菌羣的確證試驗。

sentences.english: How could this bet then become self-validating?
sentences.chinese: 那麼這種投機賭博行爲又怎麼會成爲自我確證的呢？

definition: each sticks to his own version (idiom); a dialogue of the deaf
to turn a deaf ear to (idiom); to pretend not to hear
loss (of sth through natural disaster, theft etc) (law)
lit. like a sheet of loose sand/fig. unable to cooperate (idiom)
